sub_title: TU Eindhoven (TU/e), Language Center: English for Academic and Professional Purposes
summary:
Specialties: 
Skills trainer for English for Academic and Professional Purposes 
Program / curriculum development and quality control for Professional Writing Skills for Professional Doctorate in Engineering program
Program / curriculum development and quality control for pre-Master's Professional Writing Skills module
Materials development (class activities, SkillsLab, thesis workshops, assessment rubrics and exams)
Blended learning / web lecture development
Tailor-made language coaching for all skills and levels
Copy-editing English language text written by native and non-native speakers
Exam preparation (e.g., IELTS, FCE, CAE, CPE, BEC, TOEFL)
All-around English-language resource
